ygData.subject: Re: help with mage
ygData.msgSnippet: ... or two of xp in firona vie with red cons, ive maxed out a lot of my skills and Im trying to lvl, but its taking so much time.  If anyone is in Rallos and
ygData.messageBody:
--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, Kittin LovesYou
<KittinLovesYou@z...> wrote:
> My biggest problem is that I spent a few hours and only got a bub
or two of xp in firona vie with red cons, ive maxed out a lot of my
skills and Im trying to lvl, but its taking so much time. If anyone
is in Rallos and would help me with this problem, it would be much
appreciated. Just to group or something.
>
> >To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> >From: Rob LeBeau <rlebeau65@y...>
> >Date: Thu, 24 Apr 2003 18:01:52 -0700 (PDT)
> >Subject: Re: [EverQuest] help with mage
> >Reply-To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> >
>
>


Do NOT fight outside. You're better off fighting in dungeons as they
provide a certain amount of XP bonus on top of the XP you get from
killing mobs. At that level, see if you can get a group in Solusek A.
It has a high XP bonus.
